channel.title: Help Badly Needed! Big Problem!
channel.description: i just putted my old server back up in the air, with hamachi this time. and now i got a small bug :P the player options are: attack and walk if in wild. and walk and trade in non wild (trade is attack option :|) but now i miss: kick option stats option real trade option and trade option must be name changed to attack. some1 knows how to fix? share it with me. thank you :)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 09:25:30 AM[/size][hr]can some1 help me here?

item.title: Help Badly Needed! Big Problem!
item.dc:creator: @xiokiller xiokiller
item.description:
@xiokiller wrote:

i just putted my old server back up in the air, with hamachi this time.
and now i got a small bug
the player options are: attack and walk if in wild.
and walk and trade in non wild (trade is attack option :|)
but now i miss: kick option
stats option
real trade option
and trade option must be name changed to attack.
some1 knows how to fix?
share it with me.
thank you :)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 09:25:30 AM[/size][hr]can some1 help me here?
